com.compendium.core.datamodel
Interface IModel

All Known Implementing Classes:
Model
public interface IModel

IModel Class is the interface to the Model class which is the base class for the object cache for a given database and also holds a set of the database service objects.

  • Compendium data objects
  • Database service objects
  • User Profile object
  • Method to generate Unique IDs based on the timestamp and IP address combination

codeNameExists

boolean codeNameExists(java.lang.String sCodeID,
                       java.lang.String name)
Checks if a code with the passed name already exists in the data and does not have the the given code id.

Parameters:
sCodeID - the code id to ignore
sName - the code name to check.
Returns:
true if a duplicate named code exists, else false

Add a code to the code cache.

Parameters:
Code - code, the code to add to the code cache.
Returns:
boolean, true if the code was added to the cache, else false.

removeCode

void removeCode(Code code)
Remove a code from the code cache.

Parameters:
Code - code, the code to remove from the code cache.

replaceCode

void replaceCode(Code code)
Replace a code in the code cache with the given code, where the code id's match.

Parameters:
Code - code, the code which to replace in the cache.

loadAllCodeGroups

void loadAllCodeGroups()
                       throws java.lang.Exception
Load a set of all code groups for the current project from the database and store in the code cache.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getCodeGroup

java.util.Hashtable getCodeGroup(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID)
Returns the Hashtable of information for the code group with the given id. Currently the hastable contains two element keys: 'children' is mapped to a Hashtable of all Code object in the code group (codeid, code). 'group' is mapped to a Vector of code group information: 0=CodeGroupID, 1=Name.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to get from the code cache.
Returns:
Hashtable, containing the code group information if found, else empty.

getUngroupedCodes

java.util.Hashtable getUngroupedCodes()
Return all the ungrouped codes in the code cache.

Returns:
Hashtable, all the ungrouped codes in the code cache.

getCodeGroups

java.util.Hashtable getCodeGroups()
Gets all the codesgroups from the code cache.

Returns:
Hashtable, containing hashtables of information about all the code groups in the code cache. Currently the hastable contains two element keys: 'children' is mapped to a Hashtable of all Code object in the code group (codeid, code). 'group' is mapped to a Vector of code group information: 0=CodeGroupID, 1=Name.

addCodeGroup

void addCodeGroup(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                  java.util.Vector group)
This method adds in a code group to the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to add to the cache.
Vector - vtGroup, the Vector of information about the code group. Currently the elements in the Vector are: 0=CodeGroupID, 1=Name

addCodeGroupCode

void addCodeGroupCode(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                      java.lang.String sCodeID,
                      Code code)
This method replace a codegroup name for the given codegroup id in the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group whose name to replace.
String - sName, the new name of the code group.

removeCodeGroup

void removeCodeGroup(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID)
This method adds in a code into code group in the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to add the code to
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to add.
Code - code, the Code object to add to the code group with the given code group id.

replaceCodeGroupName

void replaceCodeGroupName(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                          java.lang.String sName)
This method removes a code group with the given id from the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the cide group to remove from the cache.

removeCodeGroupCode

void removeCodeGroupCode(java.lang.String sCodeGroupID,
                         java.lang.String sCodeID)
This method removes a code from a certain code group in the cache.

Parameters:
String - sCodeGroupID, the id of the code group to remove the code from.
String - sCodeID, the id of the code to remove from the code group.

cleanUp

void cleanUp()
Help to clear up variables used by this object to assist with garbage collection.
